document_name_accent: ung thu buong trung giai doan 4.json
document_title: Stage 4 ovarian cancer: Symptoms, treatment and prognosis
subsection_name: ung-thu-buong-trung-giai-doan-4.json_4_The goal of treatment for stage IV ovarian cancer
subsection_content: According to MSc. Luu Thao Ngoc, completely eliminating ovarian cancer cells in the final stages is impossible, because by this time the cancer cells have metastasized to distant organs such as the liver, lungs, brain... The goal of treatment for stage IV ovarian cancer patients is to alleviate symptoms of the disease and prolong survival.
subsection_title: ung thu buong trung giai doan 4.json. The goal of treatment for stage IV ovarian cancer
subsection_data:
ung thu buong trung giai doan 4.json. The goal of treatment for stage IV ovarian cancer
According to MSc. Luu Thao Ngoc, completely eliminating ovarian cancer cells in the final stages is impossible, because by this time the cancer cells have metastasized to distant organs such as the liver, lungs, brain... The goal of treatment for stage IV ovarian cancer patients is to alleviate symptoms of the disease and prolong survival.
